DOC.brief_summary: This open-label safety extension study will assess the safety and tolerability of once daily dosing of 590 mg Liposomal Amikacin for Inhalation (LAI) added to a multi-drug regimen in subjects with non-tuberculous mycobacterium (NTM) lung infections due to Mycobacterium avium complex (MAC) who are refractory to therapy in Study INS-212.
DOC.brief_title: Open-label Safety Extension Study Assessing Safety and Tolerability of LAI in Patients Who Participated in Study INS-212
DOC.criteria: Key 1. have successfully completed the Month 6 and End of Treatment visits in Study INS212 2. have not achieved the INS212 protocol definition of culture conversion by Month 6 in Study INS212 OR have experienced a relapse or recurrence by Month 6 in Study INS212. Key 1. achieved culture conversion without relapse or recurrence in the Study INS212 study by Month 6
